description:
Total amount of income

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73111 Wage and income tax statistics

Definition:
As per Section 2 (3) of the Income Tax Act:
Total income from the seven sources of earnings after
deduction of business and income-related expenses minus the
amount of old-age relief and the deduction pursuant to
Section 13 (3).

name: Total amount of income
